title: Roxen releases new song “UFO”!
text:
Roxen releases new song “UFO”!
Roxen has released a new song but not so new in the Eurovision bubble, “UFO” finished 2nd in the internal selection of 2021 where “Amnesia” won. Former Head of Delegation, Liana Stanciu stated last year that her favorite song was indeed UFO and finished second, but a jury panel decided to go with “Amnesia” for Eurovision.
Now the song is out, what do you think? Could have been a better option for Romania in 2021 or do you prefer “Amnesia”? Tell us down bellow!
Last year Romania was represented by Roxen with her song “Amnesia”, she was internally selected for the 2nd time after the cancellation of the Eurovision Song Contest in 2020. Sadly she didn’t reach the Grand Final and finished 12th in the Semifinal with 85 points.
